dmca.title: [Fwd: FW: DMCA ISP Notification powersellernyc.com/Onkyo]
dmca.body:
Please make sure you upload the attach documents into the case in question. Thanks.

-----Original Message-----
From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Friday, December 15, 2006 2:45 PM
To: Legal Response
Subject: RE: [Fwd: FW: DMCA ISP Notification powersellernyc.com/Onkyo]

The Planet,

We have rechecked www.powerseller.com and they are still infringing on Onkyo's text.
 Text is a description written about a product in order to support the sale of a
product.  I have attached a PDF file with the infringing material circled in red and
I also attached a PDF of Onkyo's website showing that the text is the same.  I am
also sending you all the infringing URL's.  If you need any further assistance
please contact me via email at Bdavis@netenforcers.com. 

http://powersellernyc.com/product-14045--Onkyo-TX-SR602-7-1-Channel-Home-Theater-Receiver-.html


http://powersellernyc.com/product-14057--Onkyo-HT-S670S-5-1-CHANNEL-HOME-THEATER-SYSTEM-.html


http://powersellernyc.com/product-15078--ONKYO-TX-SR702-THX-SELECT-7-1-CHANNEL-HOME-THEATER-RECEIVER-.html


http://powersellernyc.com/product-16310--Onkyo-TX-SR603X-7-1-Channel-Home-Theater-Receiver-.html


http://powersellernyc.com/product-16311--Onkyo-TX-SR703-THX-Select2-7-1-Channel-Home-Theater-Receiver-.html


http://powersellernyc.com/product-17997--Onkyo-SKS-HT240-Home-Theater-Speaker-System-.html



Thank you,

Barbara Davis
LMS Manager
Net Enforcers Inc.
BDavis@netenforcers.com
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged. 
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction
or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.


-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Legal Response Team [mailto:LegalResponse@theplanet.com]
Sent: Friday, December 15, 2006 2:09 PM
To: Barbara Davis
Subject: [Fwd: FW: DMCA ISP Notification powersellernyc.com/Onkyo]

We are unable to locate on the web pagepowersellernyc.com any of the material that
you claim is being infringed as of  01:08 PM --600 (Central Standard Time), Friday,
December 15  2006.

--
The Planet-EV1 Legal Response Team
https://www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=legal
(214)782-7800 :: 1-800-377-6103
Fax:: (214) 782-7756




________________________________

From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com]
Sent: Thursday, December 14, 2006 3:43 PM
To: abuse; Copyright; Legal Response
Cc: sales@PowerSellerNYC.com; support@PowerSellerNYC.com
Subject: DMCA ISP Notification powersellernyc.com/Onkyo



To whom it may concern,



This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent to you regarding your
client www.powersellernyc.com <http://www.powersellernyc.com/>  and our client
Onkyo. Your client recived a DMCA Notiification informing them of the unauthorized
use of copyrighted images and trademarked logos. They received this letter on
12/03/2006 and was given eight (8) days to comply. The website has been rechecked
and I am showing your client has yet to comply. Please provide me with a follow-up
on this by 12/18/2006. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact
me via email at Bdavis@netneforcers.com.  Below you will find a copy of the
origional Cease and Desist letter.



ISP CEASE AND DESIST LETTER



12/01/2006



7155 5474 4100 4346 4730



VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED



Designated Agent

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

George Poletes

1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207



Re:  Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property



Dear Designated Agent:



This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C.
